definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
short-tailed bird
to push out/to release/to launch/to publish/to recommend
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
to recommend/recommendation
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
to put into effect/to carry out
to postpone/to put off/to defer
to market/to sell
speculation/to conjecture/to surmise/to speculate
to push open (a gate etc)/to push away/to reject/to decline
to overthrow
to esteem/to think highly of/to accord importance to/to revere
to infer/to deduce/to predict/to extrapolate
to calculate/to reckon/to extrapolate (in calculation)
(of time) to elapse or pass/(of a situation) to develop or evolve

sentences.english: Revolving pushing is one of the methods of pushing shot.
sentences.chinese: 旋转推铅是推铅球的方法之一。

sentences.english: We put our backpacks on the board and swam in the water pushing the board.
sentences.chinese: 我们把背包放到木板上，推着木板在水里游。

sentences.english: You can by hand small pushes, so that lymph flow more smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 可以用手轻轻地推按，使淋巴的流动更顺畅。

sentences.english: The working principle of vertical slicer with pusher was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了推板式垂直分切机的工作原理。
那也别忘了推着小车卖面条。

sentences.english: Paramount referred all calls on the matter to Viacom.
sentences.chinese: 派拉蒙把所有有关问题推到维亚康姆。

sentences.english: It is an extrapolation with consequences.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个有后续影响力的外推。

sentences.english: Sequencing batch reactor(SBR) has some advantages of continuous stirred tank reactor(CSTR) and plug flow reactor(PF).
sentences.chinese: SBR兼有全混合反应器与推流式反应器的优点。

sentences.english: When Bertha came up to him he put her gently aside.
sentences.chinese: 当伯莎来到他身边时，他轻轻地把她推在一旁。

sentences.english: Xiao fantasy to the exam, want to push the temperature MinGu housekeeping.
sentences.chinese: 晓幻想要考试，想推了温民家的家政。

sentences.english: Therefore the government must continue to prop up housing prices or provide incentives to encourage people to buy homes.
sentences.chinese: 因此，政府必须继续推高房价或者激励人们买房子。

sentences.english: That is getting the whole thing backward, of course.
sentences.chinese: 这当然是将整个事情又朝后推了。

sentences.english: Seven. You will feel this immediately in your arms.
sentences.chinese: 用力推，七，你的手臂很快就会有感觉。

sentences.english: The harder you push, the more quickly that cart will move.
sentences.chinese: 你越使劲推，车就越跑的快。

sentences.english: To release, push the liner to the left.
sentences.chinese: 要解锁，把锁片向左推就行了。
